name: Aeschylus
description: Earth has used up all its landmass for trash and seeks another planet to dump its garbage on. With the finding of a closer planet called Debos, the space crew of the Aeschylus begins dumping Earth's trash onto the planet. However, on route back home, something goes terribly wrong. With this new space horror game, the player must solve puzzles to unlock parts of the ship in order to gain clues to the mysterious event that lead to the crew's demise.
